channel.title: fn blog<R: Read>(reader: R);
channel.description: Recent content on fn blog<R: Read>(reader: R);

item.title: Experiments in Cloud Gaming: Pt 1
item.author: shymega@shymega.org.uk (Dom Rodriguez (shymega))
item.description: (Initially posted here on my LinkedIn profile, but I’ve decided to move it to my blog, and tidy it up a bit.) The idea is to use the cloud to play games (yes, I know - but this is a fun application of what could be used in the workplace professionally - it’s the fundamental skillls in cloud tech that are important here), all controlled with AWS Lambda functions, and using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) to deploy the setup.

item.title: Seizure prediction: v1
item.author: shymega@shymega.org.uk (Dom Rodriguez (shymega))
item.description: This post marks the beginning of a research project into seizure prediction. I have generalised epilepsy, after two tonic-clonic fits I experienced in December 2017. They were both preceded by an aura, which I ignored, and continued on my commute. Ultimately, I ended up collapsing, having a seizure, and being taken to hospital. I still have seizures, but these are mostly focal/absences/myoclonic. I’m worried when I leave the house on my own, and I find it difficult.

item.title: About
item.author: shymega@shymega.org.uk (Dom Rodriguez (shymega))
item.description: Hi, I’m Dom. I’m a 20-something hobbyist programmer, advocate of open source/free software, and interested in electronics. In terms of software, you can see my Github profile and my projects that I work on. I do have a habit of starting projects, and then ending up with no time/motivation to work on it – rest assured,that does not necessarily mean I’ve given up on them. I’m also a hobbyist photographer, and enjoy taking landscape & candid photographs.

item.title: Hello World!
item.author: shymega@shymega.org.uk (Dom Rodriguez (shymega))
item.description: Welcome to my blog. I haven’t really gotten into blogging, but I’d like to share some stuff about my projects that I do in my spare time :)
